unnormalised: Okay, konn tori algebraic equations sodovnne vixim vicharlem, bare? Tem dista titlem bhirankull nhoi, bhai. Ami tem sodovnneche kuxik kortelim. Poilem, mulbhut vichar somzun ghe: tum ek variablechem mol (sadharanponnan 'x') sodunk toyar asa je equation satya korta. Taka ek balance scale koxi chint – tum ek vatten je kortai, tem tumka dusre vatten korchem poddtta tem balance dovrunk.
normalised: Barobar, konnem tor algebraic equations sodovnuk korche vixim vicharlem, kiteak? Tem dista titlen bhiranticher na, bhai. Ami tem kholun sangya. Poilem, mulbhut vichar somzun ghe: tumi eka variable (samanyatayen 'x') chem mol sodunk sodtat je equation satya kortat. Eka balance scale vixinchi kalpna kara – tumi eka vaten kitem-i kortat, tem tulen dovrunk dusrea vaten korchem podta.

unnormalised: Udharonnak, ek sadem equation: x + 5 = 10. 'x' sodunk, tumka taka isolate korchem poddtta. Donui vatten lean 5 uzoi: x + 5 - 5 = 10 - 5, jem x = 5 zata. Dista? Sope asha! Aata, tumchea lagim 2x = 12 assa mhonn somza. Hanga, 'x' 2 lean gunnla. 'x' isolate korunk, donui vatten 2 lean bhag kor: 2x / 2 = 12 / 2, jem x = 6 zata.
normalised: Udharonnak, ek sadem equation: x plus panch bara bara. 'x' sodunk, tumi taka veglo korcho podta. Donuy vaten panch minus kara: x plus panch minus panch bara bara minus panch, je x bara panch mhunn sadem zata. Dekhlem? Kitlen sope! Atam, tumchea lagim don x bara bara asa mhunn dhorat. Hangam, 'x' donan gunnlelem asa. 'x' veglo korunk, donuy vaten donan bhag div: don x divided by don bara bara divided by don, je x bara so mhunn sadem zata.

unnormalised: 3x + 2 = 11 koxe equations kodden vostu thodi kathinn zata. Poilem, donui vatten lean 2 uzoi: 3x + 2 - 2 = 11 - 2, jem tumka 3x = 9 dita. Magir, donui vatten 3 lean bhag kor: 3x / 3 = 9 / 3, teka lagun x = 3. Operations-chi kramviri visor naka – sadharanponnan, multiplication/division mhoren addition/subtraction undo kora.
normalised: Teen x plus don bara ekhra vixinchea equations kodden vostu thoddeo zattal zatat. Poilem, donuy vaten don minus kara: teen x plus don minus don bara ekhra minus don, je tumkam teen x bara nau dita. Magir, donuy vaten teenan bhag div: teen x divided by teen bara nau divided by teen, mhunn x bara teen. Operations-cho kram visrunakat – sadarponan, gunnkar vo bhagkar adim addition vo subtraction undo kara.

unnormalised: Practice tumka perfect karta, yaar. He sodovnnek laita: 4x - 7 = 9, 5x + 3 = 18, ani x / 2 + 1 = 6. Jevabo x = 4, x = 3, ani x = 10 asa, teka lagun tum tumnchea kamacho tatuncho korunk xakta. Ek pavtim tum he single-variable equations-che kamak lagtai, tum more complex vostu kushi move on korunk xakta quadratic equations (e.g., x^2 + 5x + 6 = 0) vo systems of equations koxe. Subh aaso!
normalised: Practice perfect korta, yaar. Him sodovnuk korunk prayatn kara: char x minus sat bara nau, panch x plus teen bara athra, ani x divided by don plus ek bara so. Javab x bara char, x bara teen, ani x bara dha asa, mhunn tumi tumchea kamacho jatan gheunk zatat. Ekdam tumi him single-variable equations somzun ghetlear, tumi quadratic equations (zoxe, x squared plus panch x plus so bara zero) vo equations chi system sarkhea adhik jatil vostunk vochun yetat. Tumkam subhechha!
